Name: JumpBeamer
Notes: A purple stationary robot enemy with a spring head. It remains in the ground passively before the player approaches it. If the player is nearby, it jumps out of the ground and emits several rings of electricity. The player can bounce off of its spring head. It gets stunned when using a Spin Attack. This fully expands its spring head. It is not possible to destroy it through any means.

Obj_arg0.Name: Ring Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The rate at which the individual rings grow. Default is 20.

Obj_arg1.Name: Ring Duration
Obj_arg1.Description: The life time of an individual ring before it disappears. Default is 100.

SW_A.Description: It remains passive while this switch is not activated.

SW_B.Description: It will become passive after activating this switch.

SW_PARAM.Description: Animations, velocity and update rates are adjusted with ParamScale while this switch is activated.

Group.Description: If one Jump Beamer in this group emits a ring, all of the other Jump Beamers will do so as well.

Camera.Description: Used when player gets bounced off.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted and frozen by player 2.
